00031 namespace Utilities.Web.Netflix
00032 {
00036     public class Netflix : OAuth.OAuth
00037     {
00038         #region Constructor
00039 
00043         public Netflix()
00044             : base()
00045         {
00046             this.SignatureType = Signature.HMACSHA1;
00047         }
00048 
00049         #endregion
00050 
00051         #region Public Functions
00052 
00058         public List<string> AutoComplete(string Term)
00059         {
00060             List<string> Results = new List<string>();
00061             string Content = FileManager.GetFileContents(new Uri("http://api.netflix.com/catalog/titles/autocomplete?oauth_consumer_key=" + ConsumerKey + "&term=" + Term));
00062             XmlDocument Document = new XmlDocument();
00063             Document.LoadXml(Content);
00064             foreach (XmlNode Children in Document.ChildNodes)
00065             {
00066                 if (Children.Name.Equals("autocomplete", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00067                 {
00068                     foreach (XmlNode Child in Children.ChildNodes)
00069                     {
00070                         if (Child.Name.Equals("autocomplete_item", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00071                         {
00072 
00073                             foreach (XmlNode Title in Child.ChildNodes)
00074                             {
00075                                 if (Title.Name.Equals("title", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00076                                 {
00077                                     Results.Add(Title.Attributes["short"].Value);
00078                                 }
00079                             }
00080                         }
00081                     }
00082                 }
00083             }
00084             return Results;  
00085         }
00086 
00094         public Titles TitleSearch(string Term, int MaxResults, int StartIndex)
00095         {
00096             AddParameter("term", Term);
00097             AddParameter("max_results", MaxResults.ToString());
00098             AddParameter("start_index", StartIndex.ToString());
00099             this.Token = "";
00100             this.TokenSecret = "";
00101             this.Method = HTTPMethod.GET;
00102             this.Url = new Uri("http://api.netflix.com/catalog/titles/");
00103             return new Titles(FileManager.GetFileContents(new Uri(GenerateRequest())));
00104         }
00105 
00111         public string TitleSynopsis(Title Title)
00112         {
00113             this.Token = "";
00114             this.TokenSecret = "";
00115             this.Method = HTTPMethod.GET;
00116             this.Url = new Uri(Title.SynopsisLink);
00117             string Content = FileManager.GetFileContents(new Uri(GenerateRequest()));
00118 
00119             XmlDocument Document = new XmlDocument();
00120             Document.LoadXml(Content);
00121             foreach (XmlNode Children in Document.ChildNodes)
00122             {
00123                 if (Children.Name.Equals("synopsis", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00124                 {
00125                     return Children.InnerText;
00126                 }
00127             }
00128 
00129             return "";
00130         }
00131 
00137         public People CastLookup(Title Title)
00138         {
00139             this.Token = "";
00140             this.TokenSecret = "";

00166         {

00172         }

00179         public List<string> FormatsAvailable(Title Title)
00180         {
00181             this.Token = "";
00182             this.TokenSecret = "";
00183             this.Method = HTTPMethod.GET;
00184             this.Url = new Uri(Title.FormatsAvailableLink);
00185             string Content = FileManager.GetFileContents(new Uri(GenerateRequest()));
00186             List<string> Results = new List<string>();
00187             if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Content))
00188             {
00189                 XmlDocument Document = new XmlDocument();
00190                 Document.LoadXml(Content);
00191                 foreach (XmlNode Children in Document.ChildNodes)
00192                 {
00193                     if (Children.Name.Equals("delivery_formats", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00194                     {
00195                         foreach (XmlNode Child in Children.ChildNodes)
00196                         {
00197                             if (Child.Name.Equals("availability", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00198                             {
00199                                 foreach (XmlNode Category in Child.ChildNodes)
00200                                 {
00201                                     if (Category.Name.Equals("category", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00202                                     {
00203                                         Results.Add(Category.Attributes["term"].Value);
00204                                     }
00205                                 }
00206                             }
00207                         }
00208                     }
00209                 }
00210             }
00211             return Results;
00212         }

00214         #endregion
00215     }
